00026 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_View_PDF extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_View_Default {

00028 
00036         public function render($gp,$errors) {
00037                 $content = parent::render($gp,$errors);
00038                 $markers = array();
00039                 $markers['###ip###'] = t3lib_div::getIndpEnv('REMOTE_ADDR');
00040                 $markers['###submission_date###'] = date("d.m.Y H:i:s",time());
00041                 $markers['###pid###'] = $GLOBALS['TSFE']->id;
00042                 
00043                 $content = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($content, $markers);
00044 
00045                 return $this->pi_wrapInBaseClass($content);
00046         }
00047 }
